text: Studio logo transitions into a CONSTELLATION in space. Ca pulls BACK, as more stars enter frame, forming a starfiel
A sensei once counseled a grief- stricken boy, as his older brother
3 prepared to leave for battle.
N STARS - Begin to see a DOZEN or so stars, almost formin zig-zagged line. Cam continues to adjust.
He said, "Child, why do you cry? You are both part of a family. And a family is a bond that cannot be broken by war. By strife. By force or neglect.
N STARS - Cam slows its truck-out to a gradual stop as we see the pattern beginning to form. As if following the st pattern, the CAM LOWERS as we find ourselves going into-
And more importantly, you are brothers. And brothers you shall remain, despite time... argument...
LOWER - framing the tops of JUNGLE, moonlit and surrounde mist. A mountain range peaks over the horizon.
..and even... distance.
CAM RESTS atop an old CHURCH ROOF. The peaceful scene is suddenly stopped by a MACHINE GUN BURST! CAM CRANES over
roof revealing -
A relatively modern village... for a remote jungle. Dawn JUST barely beginning to break. The morning mist persists we see FOUR FEDERALES with machine guns surrounding a gro of VILLAGERS.
N GROUND - A WOMAN VILLAGER is thrown down. Her SON, 8, r 1 to her side. She's mad. Her son cries.
You monsters!

UP ANGLE - As we see the THREE FEDERALES, greasy men, hol AK-47's, and looking down with hardened indifference. OS, hear an EVIL CHUCKLE. The men part as we see- - COL. PANTERA. A bottom-heavy disgusting pig of a man wa up between them. Pantera leans down, face to face with he
We appreciate the generous donation for the continued protection of your village.

ANGLE ON - Their jeep, overflowing with the Village's precious crops. WIDER - A tiny group (10) of other villagers stand at a s distance. The Woman's HUSBAND runs forward. He immediatel LUNGES at Pantera, just as- -SHIKA-SHIKA - Pantera is flanked by 3 MACHINE GUNS point at the Husband's chest. Pantera slothfully grins. He lean forward and yanks an HEIRLOOM NECKLACE from her neck.
After all, the jungle can be a very dangerous place. BAH-HAHAHAHA.
They jump into the Jeep and tear into the jungle LAUGHING
4 The jeep clamors down the bumpy makeshift path. Pantera s in the passenger seat as the others are crammed in around food. The Jungle looms ominous around them.

IGH ANGLE - As we watch the jeep from the jungle ceiling high above... as if from someone's POV. ON DRIVER - He suddenly reacts to a fallen tree on the ro ahead. Slams on the brakes. Pantera is thrown around.
Idiota! Watch where you're going!
There's a log on the road, senor. (quietly to himself) ...that wasn't there an hour ago.
Well, what are you waiting for?! REMOVE IT! (to soldiers behind) Cortez! Andelay!

CORTEZ leaps out. Grabs the winch from the front of the j and pulls it to the log, roughly 15 feet away. EEP POV - Pantera and Driver barely notice the out-of-foc bg Cortez get suddenly YANKED out of scene!
...yirk!
ON DRIVER - His eyes go wide. Trying to see in the dark.
(softly, nervous) D-d-dios mio.
ON LOG - Cortez is gone. Pantera wakes up.
What?! WHAT IS IT?!

OS - Hear the sound of a CHAIN clinking. Then WHOOSHING a the chain winch suddenly FLIES IN, and CRACKS the BURLY SOLDIER across the jaw! It wraps itself around his neck. Before he can react... - YOINK! He gets pulled over the hood of the jeep, landin the ground HARD.
OOF!

Burly gets pulled backward... away from the Jeep and into the darkness. He SCREAMS the entire way, clawing the grou ON JEEP - Driver is freaking out now. Last Soldier is in back. Pantera stands up in the jeep. "Last" jumps out and readies his machine gun.
(to Jungle) WHO ARE YOU?! SHOW YOURSELF!!
(WHISPER) ...The Ghost of the Jungle.
What?!
( shaking/nervous) The jungle god that punishes those who prey upon the weak. (looks scared to Pantera) He's coming... for us.

OS NOISE - Suddenly hear the whooshing of 4 quick punches kicks, a short machine gun burst and a WHUMP. Pantera and Driver look to the ground. ON GROUND - Last Soldier lays beaten on the jungle floor.
I'm sorry, senor.
Driver bounds out of the Jeep and runs SCREAMING into the jungle. CAM PULLS BACK with him as Pantera shrinks in bg.
COWARD!! GET BACK HERE!!
Something suddenly skitters behind Pantera! He turns to l Nothing. He reaches down and pulls up... a MACHETE.
SHOW YOURSELF! DO YOU REALIZE WHO YOU'RE DEALING WITH?!

ON PANTERA - He circles backs against the Jungle wall, tr to find him. Tense. Suddenly- -a PAIR OF WHITE EYES open in the blackness behind him! n a quick series of shots we see Pantera getting the raw of a flurry of fist and foot attacks. His attacker is mov way too fast for the camera to keep up. Pantera falls back, panting heavily. Panicked. He tears o into the dense Jungle! ON PANTERA RUNNING THROUGH JUNGLE - Thick foliage. Panick
5 An oasis of calm, violated by this sweating, machete- clutching brute. He stumbles, then stands in the middle.
I am not afraid of a myth! (eyes darting)
I'M NOT AFRAID OF A GHOST!
Actually... it's "Turtle", pal.

Pantera swings around. Eyes wide. N ATTACKER - We pan up the thick green legs. Muscular and strong. Further up. Arms to match. Rough skin. It wears a shorn HOODED PONCHO. Inside are two white eyes and gritte smiling teeth. The poncho falls to the ground.
ON ATTACKER - It's LEONARDO! Beaten blue bandana blowing the breeze. Total hero shot. He pulls out a SINGLE KATANA SWORD, poised for battle. Pantera's backed into a corner.
Let's see if a ghost can die, then.
Pantera SCREAMS and runs to Leo and starts swinging! At t CLASH of sword and machete, we-

The Boy is still at the Village Clearing. Suddenly - - the sound of the JEEP begins to rumble in the distance! villagers panic and scatter. VROOM! The Jeep flies out of jungle and bounce-slows into the FG! Only there is no one driving it... and it still has the stolen food in it. And the stolen medallion dangles from rear view mirror.
It's a miracle!

The village rejoices. The Boy steps aside for a beat, loo back at the Jungle. Something catches his eye. ...a small crouched figure on a tree branch. Barely silhouetted. His white eyes lit in the darkness. One of t WINKS as the boy smiles.
(beaming... softly) The Ghost of the Jungle.
7 Leo leaps into frame. He takes out his katanas and lays t carefully on the ground. He KNEELS, head bowed, eyes clos
My training is now complete.
The camera lifts away from Leo... and then PLUNGES into t nearby CAVERN. MUSIC begins to swell. Cam travels a few f until it DIPS TO BLACK, and comes up beginning our-

location: MISCELLANEOUS SEWER, OIL AND IRRIGATION PIPES

text: The music is in full tilt as the camera travels through seemingly miles of underground pipes of all types and des he camera comes to the end of line. It rises up through 9   STEAM... then through a metal grate, as we find ourse
A mouse-level shot of the spectacular city that never sle It's oddly hypnotic. Still. Until... - BAM! A pair of sneakers land barely in front of the cam tearing off into the distance.
FREEEZE! STOP OR WE'LL SHOOT!

Shoes belong to a panicked MUGGER, early 20's, as THREE N OFFICERS clamor after him. The Mugger is a jackrabbit - hopping newspaper machines, rolling under passing trucks doing anything he can to avoid arrest. ventually the NYPD peter out. The mugger looks back. Smil
Heh, heh... suckers.
ON MUGGER - His eyes suddenly go wide as - VROOOOOM! - we a jet-black tweaked out motorcycle fly over the cops' hea aiming directly for Mugger!
Whaaa!!!
The Mugger runs, but can't escape. The Driver is dressed all-black motorcycle leathers and black-visored helmet. S and faceless. He quickly gains on the Mugger and GRABS hi the collar in mid-stride!
You crazy?! Put me down, man!
But Driver doesn't. Instead, he holds him lower without stopping the bike... and proceeds to plow Mugger's head i every trash can and garbage bin along 9th Avenue!
OW! HEY! WHAT'RE YOU-OW!! OOF!
Just as it looks like he'll hit a telephone pole... Drive veers left! He drags the Mugger into...

Driver tosses him onto the ground at full speed. Mugger SLIDES down the alley and collides with a pile of garbage like he's a human bowling ball. ON HEAD OF ALLEY - The Driver guns the bike and kicks up ton of dust and racket, peeling donuts at mouth of the al And then he stops. Dust slowly settles and smoke dissipat
Wh-wh-what kinda freak are you?!

The Driver gets off the bike. Silence. Backlit by headlig He walks directly to the Mugger with purpose. Mugger star to really freak out. Driver picks him up by the collar an SLAMS him to the back WOODEN FENCE WALL.
P-p-please. Don't kill me, man.
Driver just cocks his head. Mugger can see his own terrif reflection his Driver's black visor. Driver reaches behin his back and pulls out a COMBAT KNIFE! He reels back and.
Wh-wha-wha-WHAT ARE YOU DOI- AAAGH!

HAM! - Driver nails the dagger through the Mugger's JACKE PINNING HIM TO THE WALL. Driver turns around to gather th purse's belongings at the mouth of the alley. fter he stops cringing, the Mugger wriggles the blade out the wall. Driver doesn't notice as - THWIP-IP-IP! - he hu the knife at the Driver! THUNK! It sticks in the DRIVER'S BACK! N MUGGER - His grinning eyes suddenly GO WIDE as Driver slowly turns around, UNHURT! The Mugger is trapped as Dri moves toward him... and a BOLO CHAIN drops to his side. ON WALL SHADOW - as we see a flurry of punches, kicks and throws as Driver lays a beating on the criminal who needs be taught a lesson. An OS Police Siren chirps. MOUTH OF ALLEY - The police suddenly show up, cherries flashing. They run to FG, mouths drop.
...whoa.
The Nightwatcher.
ON MUGGER - Hung upside down by a chain. Purse hangs from neck. He'll live, but never commit another crime again... 11
CLOSE ON A NEWSSTAND - Headlines read "WOMAN MYSTERIOUSLY

text: WIDER - A quieter area of the city. Broken by the squeali of the bike as Driver (Nightwatcher) roars in to a stop. Nightwatcher drives underneath a TRAIN BRIDGE. He takes o his helmet. Red cloth spills out. He turns around as we s
He reaches back and pulls out the KNIFE from his SHELL. L at it, shaking his head and grinning. He sheathes it.
Heh, heh. Nice try, chump.
QUICK SHOTS - Ignites and revs engine. Straps helmet back Headlight comes to life. Lets the clutch out. VROOOOM! - CAM STARTS TIGHT ON bike as Raphael tears away
Dude... I'm scared!
CLOSE ON - A PAIR OF TURTLE EYES... MICHAELANGELO'S! They wide with FEAR. Nervously darting around, unable to keep with the surrounding danger.
Dude! They're all around me! What do I do? WHAT DO I DO?!
Mikey's eyes continue to panic. DONATELLO's voice comes i over a RADIO. Calming.
Just relax, Mikey. Remember your training. You'll be fine.
But I need back up this time, man! BACK UP!
...you're such a prima donna.

head_text.subj: CAM PULLS BACK TO REVEAL WE'RE IN-

text: The cam pulls out of a LARGE MASCOT HEAD - looks like a b goofy Turtle head with googly eyes and dumb smile. WIDER see a fake ZIPPER spirit-glued onto Mikey's plastron. In hands, he holds two nerf-styled NUNCHUCKS.
(from inside mascot head) Okay - waita-WHOA-WHOA-WHOA-WHOA!!
Suddenly TEN KIDS WITH BIRTHDAY HATS AND FOAM NUNCHUCKS r in SCREAMING and start beating on Mikey... a little too h
Get him! Yeah! You suck! Hey! Awright! Take that, Turtle-dork!
OH-WHOA! OW! YEOW-OW-OW! WATCH IT!! HEY! NOT BELOW THE-OOOFF!! OW!!
End WIDER with the kids all walking away from Mikey, now the floor doubled over from the "playing". A beat, then- -one more kid runs back and kicks Mikey.
KEEEEYA! (turns and walks back) This was the best birthday ever, Mommy!
Mikey GROANS as we-

Beautiful downtown autumnal street. Parked in front, we s the "COWABUNGA CARL" PARTY VAN loudly decorated in kid- friendly colors with an embarrassing and low-tech looking TURTLE HEAD ON TOP. PUSH IN on upstairs apartment window.
Thanks so much. You're worth every penny. I have to tell all my friends about you. You'll love their kids too.
Mascot Mikey is standing at the door, holding a fistful o cash, still in full costume.
I can only hope they're as lovely as the rugrats you got here.
ON KIDS - They look tough, brandishing their nerf weapons toddler street gang. One of the kids does a finger-point- throat-slit gesture. The mom looks and beams. The kids quickly smile to cover.
(through gritted teeth) Such... angels.
Mikey looks to the side, and sees the still piled-high st of PIZZA BOXES through the fake head POV.
Okay! Everyone say good-bye to Cowabunga Carl! BYE!
(put-on voice) Hyuk! Cowabunga dudes! Bye!
ON DOOR - As the door closes and Mom turns back, a green reaches in quickly a grabs a box of pizza. The door close
Heheh... score.

15 Mikey opens the van's rear doors. He PULLS OFF the fake zipper on his chest and then pulls off his fake turtle he His trademark orange bandana spills out. He turns, breathing in the fresh surface air. A quiet bea until - A POLICE SIREN approaches, faint, in the distance Mikey jumps in the van, slams the door shut as the car whizzes by. WIDER - the van takes off down the street.
Hey, hey, hey... don't forget the face thing.

CLOSE ON - a regular motorist sitting in his car at a tra light. Don monitors from a small dashboard cam. Man looks Left. Reacts. OFF HIS LOOK - We see Mikey beside him in the van. He's behind the wheel - face FROZEN in a goofy SMILE like a ventriloquist to "hide" his identity. Don follows on a sm surveillance cam under the rearview mirror.
Yes... sir.
That's a good boy.
All's I'm saying Donnie is that no one would notice if YOU did one of these gigs every now and again.
But you add such... panache to the character.
Mikey, emotional, pops into "fully animated" facial mode. rubs his sore neck.
Well, if panache is French for "punching bag", I'd have to agree with ya.
17 A darkened room lit only by the lights of dozens of tv's, monitors and TV tubes. Cables run everywhere. In front of them is DONATELLO - our resident tech-head turtle.
Close enough. I - uh-oh-
ON MONITOR - Don watches Mikey through a TRAFFIC CAM in f of the van. Don is jacked into every major security and surveillance camera in the city.
-you got a peeping tom.
ON CAR - The Man is still looking - only now really freak out - at the fully animated Mikey head.
Aw nuts.
Mikey suddenly grips his face back into a tight SMILE, frozen. He looks over and waves at the man who confusingl waves back.
(ventriloquist style) Just get me outta here, dude.
ON DON - He hits some switches. Monitors change.
Traffic's clear eastbound for two blocks. Then hook up with route J.
BACK WITH MIKEY - He's still waving with a frozen smile.
(ventriloquist style) Righteous.

Mikey immediately "unfreezes" and sticks his tongue out a antics at the Man! Before the man can react, Mikey TEARS and zips across traffic down a deserted side-street. ...as we notice the annoying ice cream style music tinker
along with his gaining speed.
You HAD to install the music too...
All part of the cover, my friend.
19 The van parks in a long-forgotten alleyway. A dummy gate closes behind it, obscuring it from view. UNDER THE VAN - We see it's parked over a manhole cover. slowly slides shut.
20 The dripping concrete and metal maze explodes with the cacophony of Mikey riding his skateboard, backpack in tow
YEEEEEHAAAAAAWWWW!!

But this isn't just any half-pipe - it tests all of Mikey skills in ninjitsu, extreme sports and cross-training. He jumps on and off the board to occasionally tackle obstacl with all four limbs. A fun rock n' roll sequence. Feels like Mikey is miles away from the surface world whe arrives at a seemingly DEAD END. He smiles as he reveals BRICK DUMMY WALL that brings him to...
21 Mikey lands in the "foyer" of sorts. Atop entrance stairs kicks the double doors open.
Honeeeeey! I'm hooome!
As Mikey slides down the banister, the cam dollies around

behind him revealing the LAIR. Breathtaking to fresh eyes t has a wonderful lived-in feel - they're not squatters.. they've made this their HOME. Furniture is jury-rigged an the place is custom lit to provide the right kind of atmosphere. If we looked behind the surface detail, we'd a mesh of wires and circuitry powering the entire lair. Donatello runs up to Mikey. Mikey robotically hands him t wad of money from the party.
Moneymoneymoneymoney.
As Donnie walks away, Mikey LOUDLY CLEARS HIS THROAT. Don stops as Mikey holds out his hand. Don's busted - he peel off a few bills and hands Mikey his share.
Domo arigato, dude.
Mikey walks into the room and plops down on a sofa. Hits remote as a BIG SCREEN lights up in front of him. Suddenl
MICHAELANGELO!
Mikey springs from the couch. Snaps to obedience.
Yes, sensei.
ANGLE ON - SPLINTER the Japanese rodent master and father the TMNT. He is well-kempt, still walks with a cane, and the same sparkle in his eye. He approaches Mikey. Silent.
(a beat) Well?
Sensei? (thinks, then realizes) Oh! Here ya go, Master Splinter.
Mikey reaches into his bag and removes a foil-wrapped pie of BIRTHDAY CAKE. Splinter lights up.
Ahh! Butter creme frosting!
Donatello walks to Splinter. Holds his hand out, judgment
Master. No cake. You remember your last cholesterol tests.
But I- (changes attitude) -Donatello! I am your Master!
Nice try, sensei. But you can still be my Master... with low cholesterol.
Splinter surrenders the cake. As Don walks away, Michaelangelo reaches into his bag and secretly passes Splinter a smaller wrapped piece.
He-heh. You have done well, my son.
Donatello walks to the fridge and opens it - FILLED with dozens of other pieces of Birthday Cake leftovers. He tos it with the rest.                                  C

22 The street noise below is barely audible. Camera creeps a the edge of the building, reaching a row of GARGOYLES. AN ALONG GARGOYLES - Still. Concrete. Creepy. Just as we pass the fourth, we barely notice it's WHITE EYES OPENING QUICK SNAP BACK TO GARGOYLE - Only now it's gone. Somethi strange is coming to town...
Large freighters. Lots of activity. PUSH IN on a steamer crane lowers a LARGE VERTICAL CRATE to the dock - it THUM down hard.
Careful! That isn't some box full of fish!

CAM LOWERS - as APRIL O'NEIL leaps down into frame. Dress in jungle expedition gear with her head wrapped in a band She takes off her sunglasses and admires the crate. ON BOX - Labelled "O'Neil Cargo". Something ominous about crate. PUSH IN on it as April steps in front. Admires it pride. Turns, takes out a cell phone, and hits speed dial ON PHONE DISPLAY - "Calling HOME". It rings.
(impatient mutter) Where are you?

24 A spacious NYC loft - tons of bookcases work as room dividers. Piled with artifacts, unopened crates of all si boxes of maps, and a general organized mess. A hockey gam BLARES from a TV set. CAM PANS ACROSS ROOM - The telephone continues to ring ju as we reach the KITCHEN - with piles of dirty dishes and food. And then a path of strewn clothes that gets messier messier until we reach - - CASEY JONES, snoring on a sofa. He finally wakes up, clamors for the phone, tripping over mess in the process.
Talk to me.
Hey. It's me. I'm back.
Casey rubs his face, tries to orient himself. Looks at wa
Was that today, babe?
April's disappointed. Same old Casey.
Yes. It was today that I returned to you after being in a deadly jungle for almost a month.
I thought you were going to meet me down here?
I'm sorry, babe. I must've-
Forget it. I'll take a cab.
A long pause on the phone. Casey knows he's busted.
I missed you?
April doesn't answer. She closes the phone. Casey slumps his chair, shaking his head.
Good goin', Case.
Back at the dock, April is back to business.
Howie! Get this on the truck for delivery! Let's go!
P.O.V. INSIDE BOX - See April through the wood slats. We' swear we almost hear... LOW GROWLING.
25 Mikey is on his bed. His thumbs pound away at a video gam TV - bored. He puts down the controller and yells to the ceiling.
I'M! BORED!!!!!

He stands up and walks to DON'S ROOM. He opens it. It tak only one foot until the door is pushed up against piles o TECH JUNK. Mikey uses his shoulder and pushes it open. N DON - He's hunched over a work table, back to Mikey. Tinkering as always. Wild inventions line the walls, some finished, some not. Some pay tribute to past TMNT adventu
Don, y'ever feel like you were meant for more? To DO more? Like, I mean, sometimes I feel like...
MICHAELANGELO(cont'd) like we never really left that glass turtle bowl when we were little dudes.
REVERSE ANGLE - Don lifts his head up, eyes MAGNIFIED in bizarre head contraption. He flips up side panels, ELECTRONICA MUSIC blares out.
Oh, hi Mikey. You say something?
(sighs - to himself) Every day it's the same thing. Wake up. Birthday party gig. Drive home. Watch TV. Train... Rinse. Repeat.
I know. Isn't it great?
A beat. Mikey sighs, then walks back downstairs to the LI ROOM SOFA. He and the camera think he's alone, but before knows it, Splinter is sitting next to him, cross legged, still, and sipping tea.
WAH!!

Michaelangelo. Boredom is never an indicator of your surroundings. It is a reflection of your inner heart. Fill yourself with excitement on the inside... and you'll live the most rewarding life of all.
Mikey stares at Splinter, dead pan. A beat. Then returns flipping channels. He stops on a NEWS program - "NYC DIRT
And so yet again, police officials are baffled at a crime of retribution that can only be attributed to the mysterious figure
M         known as "The Nightwatcher". ikey lights up. On TV is a flashy well-coifed, know-nothi REPORTER. Beside him is a news photo of the tied up MUGGE from our second scene.
This is the latest in a string of vigilante acts that have been plaguing the city for the past year.
NYC DIRT REPORTER(cont'd) Although the victims have been criminals themselves, the Nightwatcher's actions have been identified as destructive and overly-violent... verging on the edge of lethal.

ON MIKEY - Can't smile wide enough. He runs to his room, returns with a POLAROID CAMERA. He snaps a picture of the He pulls it out, placing it in his NIGHTWATCHER SCRAPBOOK overflowing with paper clippings and articles on the vigilante.
Now THAT'S what I'm talking about! Cruising the streets, busting those who hold themselves above the law. (movie announcer voice) But they aren't above HIS.
Don walks in, holding an in-process invention. He looks u
Mikey, the man's practically a criminal himself. Anyone who operates without boundary or rule of law cannot be legislated and needs to be reigned in.
Sounds like four turtles I used ta know.
ON DOOR - Raphael walks in, his Nightwatcher costume no w in sight.
Whatta we talkin' about, boys? Soundin' a little too egghead fer my tastes.
Ah, Raphael. Your brothers and I were just discussing the vigilante Nightwatcher once again. (beat - concerned) Where have you been? You've been spending so much time away from home lately...
Raphael's on edge from the mention of Nightwatcher alread His attention doesn't break from Donatello.
I joined a book a' the month club. (to Donnie) So just what's your beef with puttin' dirtbags behind bars, Donnie? Go ahead... enlighten me.
Splinter watches the growing tension with concern.
I have no problem with the incarceration of those who deserve it, but if someone like Nightwatcher has ultimate power... then who makes sure he doesn't cross the line?
Mikey picks up two NINJA BLADE RINGS, twirling them aroun aggressively in mock battle.
I think he's COOL.
Of course you would.
(in bg, oblivious) Keeya! HATCHAAAAAA!!
Sometimes there are lines that even the police can't cross. Someone has to be willing to do what needs to be done. And to do that, fear becomes a weapon.
You are such a Neanderthal.
Raphael does the bully FAKE LUNGE at Don. Don reacts quic and startled, eyes wide.
I rest my case.
(SCOLDING) Raphael! If bullying is the only way to argue your point, then perhaps you do not have much of a point to begin with.
(gritted teeth) Yes, sensei. (to Mikey) And quit touchin' my stuff.
Raph yanks the Ring Blades out of Mikey's hands and storm out of the room by flipping up a series of cables to the second floor.
(too-late-retort to Raph) That was just a startle response and isn't really an indication of fear!
Raph does the "blah blah" hand gesture from above. Enters room, slams the door and immediately BLASTS MUSIC... ...and it's some annoying pop HIP-HOP song.
AAAARGH! AND STOP TOUCHING MY STEREO TOO, MIKEY!!!
Then HEAVY ROCK starts playing to drown out his family. A silence sits in the room as a CD flies out of Raph's room Tense in the room for a bit. Don looks at the other two.
It's an involuntary thing your body does when stimulated like that. (no response) What? It's true.

26 A large JET LINER flies into the city. Lowering. The whee fold out under the carriages. CLOSER - LEO is on the landing gear, his face lit up by t city glow in front of him. He jumps off as - FOOMP! - a H GLIDER opens up from his backpack. He lowers the glider t the water and RELEASES!
27 Disgusting. Dripping. Out of the slime, Leo rises. A beat inhales, then SMILES WIDE.
Mmm... home sweet home.

28 All is peaceful in the lair. The big screen TV is the onl light source. Mikey snores and drools on the couch, cover in junk food wrappers. Donnie sleeps with an "TECH HEAD" magazine over his face... gadget-in-process in his lap. ON ENTRANCE - Leo walks in and places his bag on the floo The place feels different... but still feels like home.
He tiptoes with ninjitsu precision across the floor, avoi the potential noise-making mess below him. He sneaks to-
29 Leo peers in cautiously. Splinter is still awake. Expecti him. Kneeling on the floor. Very serious.
Enter.
Leo walks in and kneels in front of Splinter.
I have completed my training, master. I am prepared for the next stage.
That you are, my son. You must now apply all that you have learned on your lengthy journey to your everyday life. THAT will be the most challenging training of all...
plinter reaches out and hands Leonardo an ANCIENT MEDALLI Leo is touched. CLOSE ON SHADOWS OUTSIDE OF ROOM - We see a pair of EYES, watching the entire scene... jealous.
I've missed you, Leonardo.
eo hugs Splinter.
I've missed you too, father.

I'm afraid much has changed in your brothers' spirits since you have left. But now that you are home, they will finally have the ethical and warrior leadership they have been lacking. The family needs you.
ON LEO - He swallows that big pill very hard.
Heh. Yeah... I mean, yes sensei.
(to doorway) Raphael, your brother is home.
ON OUTSIDE OF ROOM - Raphael walks out of the shadows. He good... but not too good for Splinter. Splinter and Leo b and face the doorway. An awkward silence.
Hey.
Hey.
Raphael eyes Leo... and then the medallion.
So... congratulations.
Thanks.
(awkward beat/fake yawn) Well, I'm goin' to bed.
He leaves. TV ROOM - Raph walks through the room, cuffs Don on the b of the head, and keeps on walking.
Leo's home.
Donatello wakes up, looks around. LIGHTS UP when he sees
Leo!!
ON MIKEY - He wakes up. A Cheese Doodle stuck to his uppe snout. Really groggy.
But I don't WANNA pop out of the birthday cake, Mrs. Ro- (snaps out of it) LEOOOOO!!!
Mikey flips past Donnie and slams Leo with a gripping HUG and doesn't let go.
Hey little bro! a beat) Mikey? You can let go now... um, Mikey?
(MUTTERING) So bored... so bored...

head_text.subj: CAM LOWERS INTO FLOOR AS WE...

text: VER BLACK - Quick bursts of AUDIO VIOLENCE. Steel, screaming, trampling, and rumbling. Then- -with each audio burst, we now see a VISUAL BURST. Strong rim-lit, iconic images of an IMMENSE BATTLE - a slicing b weapon, screaming mouth, angry eyes. Then- -a monster claw! Gnashing teeth! Scared eyes! Horns and tusks! The edit gets intense, until -
AAAAAAAAAAAAGGGH!!!

30 It was all a nightmare. We go WIDER as we take in the ostentatious bedroom of MAXIMILIAN WINTERS, a young mid-4 Famous NYC entrepreneur. inters is large, handsome, built and powerful in every sense. His bedroom reflects it as well - large simple sha decorated with a modern-day tribal/tech appeal. This guy filled with adrenaline, power and machismo.
Mr. Winters, sir.
ON DOORWAY - Standing there is a beautiful black-haired assistant dressed in full suit and tie with a clipboard.
It's time for your morning workout.

31 Rock/hip-hop music crashes in as we see Winters' morning workout - a combination of weaponry work (martial arts an others), floor routines and bag work. He takes it all ver seriously. Sequence ends with him smashing the top off of a Mook Jun training block with his bare fist. He walks out of the ro grabbing a towel from a blonde assistant.
32 Winters walks in his crisp suit. His office is large and austere. Two levels of history in books, artifacts, warri themed curios and power.
Mr. Winters, sir?
ON DOOR - His Assistant stands at the large doors.
The board is waiting.
Excellent.
He walks to the large bay windows that overlooks the city
33 Now outside the window, he smiles at the view.
Tell them I'm on my way down.

He slowly LOWERS OUT OF FRAME. CAM PULLS OUT WIDER REVEAL Winters Office is an "elevator" of sorts that can ride up and down the front of the building, allowing him access t any floor of his Tower without leaving his desk. WIDER - see the Tower is a monolith in the middle of Manhattan - complete with it's own front Central Park-ish gated entry. A true work of modern architecture.
34 We see the wonder of everything Winters - mixing of old artifacts with modern day aesthetic and implementation. T ceilings are vast and there is no mistaking the worth of man and his company.
inters' Elevator Office lowers into a balcony level build overseeing the main lobby. He walks down a stairwell and through the lobby, five Assistants following him.
35 Winters walks in the room. CLOSE ON him as he stops at th head of the boardroom table.
Gentlemen! Let's begin.
CAM PULLS BACK along the impossibly long table as DOZENS BOARD MEMBERS stand up. When it reaches the end, it looks though Winters stands at the head of an ARMY AT ATTENTION
Leo walks along the upper floor of their lair. As he pass Mikey's room, his brother pops out with his skateboard. W follow them as they walk down to the TV area.
Leo... what's up, bro?
Just enjoying being home.
hey walk past Donnie's Chop Shop room as - BOOM! - someth explodes and smoke pours out under his door.
NOBODY PANIC! I HAVE IT ALL UNDER CONTROL!
Mikey and Leo COUGH, leave the smokey area.
Say, what's up with April and Casey? I expected them to drop by after I got back.

We don't see much of `em anymore. April seems to be working a lot - eww - and Casey seems to be, I dunno, "different" lately. Maybe he doesn't like having to put the toilet seat down now that they've moved in together.
They're living together now?
They get to the living room area. Mikey walks to the edge a jury-rigged HALF-PIPE he built in an old water slough. Mikey continues as he skates back and forth.
To be honest with ya, they're kinda buzzkills to be around.
Is Casey at least still doing his hockey mask thing?
Dunno. Haven't noticed since The Nightwatcher has come home to roost. WOOOOHOOOOOOOO!
"Nightwatcher"? That some new comic book you're hooked on, Mikey?
RAPHAEL walks in. Picks up Mikey's scrapbook as he passes sofa and slugs it in Leo's chest.
This should explain most of it. The legacy of the city's newest hero. Compliments of the fanboy over there.    M
Joke all you want, Raphy. But train hard and eat your veggies and one day, you too can be as cool as The Nightwatcher, dude.
I can only hope, Mikey. I can only hope...
Leo disapprovingly flips through the book.
This guy could bring heat on all of us if he keeps this up. Showboating isn't a replacement for justice... it's just self-indulgence. (looks back at book) Someone needs to talk to this thug.
ON RAPH - He looks... dying to say something. But can't.
37 CLOSE ON - A familiar-looking white HOCKEY MASK. Eyes bli behind it.
Yo, Case? Wanna be goalie?
The mask is pushed aside by Casey - Kid 1 was holding it.
Nah, you know I work for a livin'. It's Star Center or nothin' else.
WIDER - Casey is with 5 other KIDS prepping for a game of STREET HOCKEY, using tennis balls and trash cans. Chubbie KID 2 walks by and grabs the mask himself.
Whatever! Let's get it on!
They begin a boisterous round of hockey. Trash talk, gent checking and all the requisite boy things. We see that th kids love Casey. And vice versa. Suddenly-
TOMMY!! IT'S TIME FOR DINNER!
BUT MA! WE JUST STARTED!
(snapping back) THOMAS!
Tommy's defeated. Looks at the disappointed boys.
Sorry dudes.
Busted! Have fun with your mommy... (face falls, disappointed) ...oh no.
OFF HIS LOOK - We see APRIL, dressed stunning in a dark business suit at the other side of the street. She's dang a WHITE SHIRT and a TIE from her other hand.
Aw, c'mon April! We just started!
April just gives him "the look" with an eyebrow cock. Cas knows he can't win.
Can't Casey stay and play for just five more minutes, Miss O'Neil? Pleeeeeeease?
Not today, Nate. Mister Jones has to pretend to be an adult for a few hours.
Awwwww! Man! Baaah!
Casey hands his stick, then quickly turns with a grin.
Later boys!
CAM FOLLOWS April and Casey as they walk down the street. April's not really a hard-ass - she's just forced to be t "responsible one" in A the relationship.
I need your help with a delivery.
(Arnold voice) Do you need my funtahstick muscles?
Heh-heh... yeah.

Casey awkwardly places his arm over her shoulder as the c rests and they walk into the distance. He pulls it back d CAM ANGLES ON WALL - As we notice CLAW MARKS sliced into concrete exterior of a building.
38 The doors open in Winters Lobby. April struts in, owning place. Casey struggles pulling the pallet holding the LAR CRATE behind them. As she passes reception-
Mr. Winters. April O'Neil is here.

His darkened office is especially alpha-male - BIG GAME H trophies adorn the walls, as do SUITS OF ARMOR from all t periods and random strange ARTIFACTS spanning history in glass cases. Winters sits at his large desk as the large doors open an April and Casey spill in.
Miss O'Neil. You are a vision. Thirty days in a jungle, and beautiful as ever.
He shakes her hand and double-cheek kisses her. Casey's e widen - is THIS what his girlfriend does?
Hello Max.
This is my... friend, Casey Jones. (
Chris! How's it going?
Winters nearly crushes Casey's hand in his grip.
Actually, It's Ca-
(ignoring, back to April) So how was your trip?
You know, the typical - corrupt government officials, double crossed by a jungle guide, all ending in a heart-pounding chase.
Winters and April chuckle. Cam adjusts to show Casey betw them in the bg, looking uncomfortable and out of place.
But it was all worth it. beat - excited) I found it. The fourth General.
Winters BEAMS, way too excited as well. April holds out h hand to Casey, who doesn't know what she wants. He awkwar HIGH FIVES her.
Yeah-ha! The fourth General.
(hushed gritted teeth) The crow-bar.
Oh.

He hands it to April as she twirls up a CROW-BAR and crac open the front panel. INSIDE BOX POV - The light gradually breaks in, until - C - the front panel falls to the floor. CLOSE ON - Winters' look. Pure wonder and admiration. He walks up to it slowly. April and Casey cautiously stay ba
(SOFT) ...the gods be praised.

ON BOX - We finally see the statue - GENERAL AGUILA - a s foot towering wall of granite and obsidian. Eagle warrior armor reflecting a South American design... though not fr specific time period. Winters rubs his hand over the ston
Can I ask you a question?
(not looking away) Y es. Of course.

I've been so grateful for the opportunities you've given me lately. I'd probably be still selling antique curios if you hadn't visited my shop that day. (off of box) But I have to ask... why the fascination with these particular works of art? I'd never even heard of the Legend of Yaotl until we met.
He looks up. The cam PANS RIGHT. It travels past an SUIT ARMOR in the FG. Goes to BLACK. Continue PAN until we're 40

-the armor becomes the back of a HELMET. Camera dollies around the helmet until we're looking at a dark and impos figure. YAOTL. His helmet is impenetrable, with eye slits Note - the flashback is dark, shadowed and monochromed. Detail is hinted at instead of shown. Very stylized.
It was a time long before the Mayans, April. Long before the Aztecs and even the Olmecs. It was a time of legends. A time of greatness. The true mother culture of Central America.
Cool shots of Yaotl. His armor, his stance, etc.
There was a man named Yaotl. More a force of nature than man. And together with his Four Warrior- Priest Generals, they pillaged every culture in their path.
QUICK SHOTS OF EACH GENERAL. The walk along side Yoatl. Possibly slo-mo. We will come to recognize them through t distinct armor as the Four Stone Generals - in human form
And for every culture they destroyed, they drank in all the magic and knowledge known to them.
WINTERS(cont'd) They became a warring hurricane, gathering more power and knowledge with each conquest.
GROUP SHOT - Of five Warriors. High atop a hillside, fina stopped. Ready for battle. Their character-specific weapo are drawn. Around them is a small army of MINIONS.
Then they came across a culture rich with science, magic and their own technology. A South American version of "Atlantis". ( BEAT) It was like blood in the water for a predator like Yaotl.

CLOSE ON - Yaotl. As he raises his sword in the air. CAM DOLLIES AROUND HIS HEAD REVEALING their opposing forces. army of THOUSANDS. Waving their weapons in the air. The opposing army CHARGES. Yaotl's men pull out   a large ORNAMENTAL STAND - a "stargate" of sorts. Yaotl   and his are unmoving... as they begin a ceremony. Yaotl   looks t heavens above - as we see a CLUSTER OF SPECIFIC   STARS m into place.
As the army approached, Yaotl used the knowledge they'd gained in black magic and sorcery. Timing their attack with the alignment of the Stars of Kikin, they opened a portal to another world.

ON CHARGING ARMY - they stop dead in their tracks. Front- by the OS portal. Don't know what to expect - ON PORTAL - A crackling electric circle opens to another dimension. Suddenly - DOZENS OF MONSTERS EXPLODE OUT! Creatures of all varieties. Gnashing Fangs. Swiping claws
They unleashed an army of monsters.
N BATTLEFIELD - men getting slaughtered (in a nice PG sor of way). Quick shots. Intense.

The monsters knew no side   - they destroyed the enemy... as   well as Yaotl's own army. Men who   swore to spill their blood for his   cause. Yaotl had to do something   to stop more from coming through.
inters SMASHES the portal, stopping the slew of monsters from pouring out. End on a scream. Dissolve to LATER in t battle...
Desolate, destroyed battlefield. Smoldering. Bodies everywhere. No monsters. End pan on Yaotl on his knees.
In the end, there were no victors. And they were responsible for the eradication of the greatest culture that will never be known. The knowledge that was lost would never be found again...

head_text.subj: DISSOLVE BACK TO PRESENT DAY IN WINTERS' OFFICE

text: Casey has fallen asleep, sitting to the side, head in his hand. A line of DROOL hangs from his mouth. April is fascinated by the story. She nudges Casey who does the slurp/half-snore wake up.
("wake up" fast speak) I was just resting my eyes...
Quite the story, Max. concerned re: Statue) You don't think that this could be-
Oh no, Miss O'Neil. looks back to statue) Like you said... just a story.
inters doesn't break his stare.
One of the girls will pay your fee on the way out.
Thanks. Um... goodbye... Max.
April and Casey leave Winters, consumed with his new treasure. He doesn't reply.
41 April and Casey walk the lobby. She shoots him "the look"
What!? It was a boring story!
That is so perfectly CASEY JONES. I give you opportunity. I give you the chance to become a better man. And what do you do with it?
APRIL(cont'd)
YOU FALL ASLEEP!
Casey stops next to a PODIUM holding a priceless-looking VASE. As he speaks, he gestures very animatedly and dangerously close to the vase.
Well, maybe if you were home for more than four days at a time, you'd see that I DON'T WANT ANY OF THIS!
(sees danger of vase) Casey, you better be careful-
Here I am nice enough to help you out, dress in this get-up and all I get is grief?!
...as he knocks and SMASHES the vase to the floor.
Oh boy.
Klaxons sound as SHINK-SHINK-SHINK - METAL PLATES SLAM DO

head_text.subj: OVER THE GLASS ENTRY. COMPLETELY ENCLOSES THE FRONT LOBBY

text: Room is now emergency light RED. April rubs her temples.
Give me strength.
42 Winters is still alone in his office. Still studying the statue. A beat. He turns his head to the side.
You can come out now.
IDER - As we see FOUR FIGURES appear out of the smallest darkest of shadows! The LEADER slinks forward - clearly a
woman - dressed in cloak and Japanese Noh mask over her f he takes it off, revealing KARAI - the beautiful leader o the Japanese Foot Clan, flanked by three, FOOT NINJAS.
Your talents are commendable.
As are yours. Most don't notice us until we decide they will.
Well, I guess I'm just special that way.
Winters walks over to his desk. The Statue looms behind t
So down to business - aside from the other reasons for your visit to America, are you interested in my offer we discussed?
I must confess... I still don't know exactly what we are to do for you.
I need the finely-tuned eyes and stealth of your Foot Ninja to... monitor the city for me over the next few days.
Winters walks to his window. It's night. Overlooks the ci
Just keep your eyes peeled for anything... strange.
(long beat) What kind of strange things?
The question hangs as we PUSH IN ON Statue's face... his eerie eyes. We think his eye GLOWS, only we-
43 The glowing eye is really a STAR. The same line pattern w saw at movie's open. The stars ADJUST... lining up in a m straight-lined manner. CAM LOWERS, placing us back in-

44 A MAN walks down the sidewalk. As he passes a DARKENED ALLEYWAY, he hears a low GROWL come from it. He stops. ALLEY POV - As the man looks in. Can't see a thing. Hand- cam. He moves to leave... and the growl comes again. STREET - Man stares in. No one on the street. Looks close closer... grows more tense as...
...WHAM! The requisite CAT jumps out of the shadows. Scar Man half to death.
WAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!! (calms down) Gave me a scare kitty.

He pets the kitty a bit, then walks off. CAM LOWERS behin cat, as Man walks off into the distance. Until... ...WHAM! A large burly CLAWED ARM slams out of the shadow onto the cat, yanking it back into the alley! Quick caterwaul. Silence. And then we hear a BURP.
AM LOWERS further through the asphalt, then quickly hooks with an air duct pipe. Zips faster and faster until we're 45
Leo feverishly works out. He stops, looking up, panting.
Does ANYBODY train anymore?!
Just a sec, dude! I'm almost at level eighteen. (OS video game explosion) Scratch that... seventeen.
DONNAY!
In... uh... a few minutes, Leo. I'm in the middle of-
KZZZT-BOOOM! - An OS invention blows up.
Um... make that another hour.
Leo sighs. Splinter walks by, not stopping.
A true leader knows how to motivate his troops regardless of their own motivations.
Splinter walks past a large FUSE BOX. Leo thinks a beat. smiles. WIDE SHOT OF LAIR MAIN ROOM as - KACHUNK! - the entire ro goes BLACK.
Aw man! What's goin' on?! WHO TURNED OUT THE LIGHTS!?
Ninja tag, topside!

Another place that isn't the TMNT lair. Dark and mysterio Don't know where we are. Feels ceremonial. We see close u detail of statue GRANITE. A DEEP VOICE chants OS in a South American tongue as HIGH TECH GEAR is placed on the rock. It becomes powered, triggering a reaction in the stone itself. Music builds as we see quick shots of the granite cracks GLOWING RED. Camera travels with the rising glow. End on a pair of DEAD EYES - suddenly come to life. Red g
47 The boys stand high atop the city below. Readying to run gauntlet of rooftop hazards. They spy a BILLBOARD off in distance.            M
First one to touch old faithful over there-
-does the other team's chores for a week.
Leo and Raph glare at each other.
Deal.
I'm with Leo!
Actually, I think you and I should pair up, Mikey.
You kiddin' me?! I mean, no offense Donnie, but you ain't exactly the biggest hitter on the bench.
Don is grinning. Observing the subtle tension.
Just trust me on this one.

Music builds to a fun number as the two teams run paralle buildings. The course requires them to work as a TEAM, throwing, catching and propelling one another from obstac to obstacle. Leo accidentally slips, PLOWING Raph face-first into a br wall. Raph, convinced Leo did it on purpose, uses his nex opportunity to hurl Leo dangerously high and far over a billboard. The situation escalates at each juncture.
Have you been avoiding me? Barely seen you since I got home.
I been busy.
(SARCASTIC) I see. So... you're definitely not upset at me or anything, right?
Why'd you think that?
I don't know... your brother gets to go on a world-wide training mission and you have to stay home. Might upset me too.
Are you trying to make me mad?
I'm just saying, I'd understand if you were upset.
Their intensity ESCALATES.
You wouldn't understand the first thing about me, daddy's boy - OOF!.
hey both trip over a duct, tumbling in a ball. They stop rolling, continue fighting.
Is that what this is about? You think Splinter likes me best?
You'd love that, wouldn't you?
WIDER - Don and Mikey are already sitting there.
So nice of you to join us, gentledudes.
And by the way, I prefer the classic military corner tuck for my bedsheets.
ikey and Don high five. Leo and Raph aren't amused. They stare down. Raph does his BULLY FLINCH fake-lunge... only doesn't twitch. Suddenly-
Whoa! Whawazzat?!
The others rush over to the edge with Mikey.
You dudes see that up there?
OFF HIS LOOK - We see LARGE SHADOWS moving with in a larg BEAM CONSTRUCTION SITE. The movement is coming from one o the higher floors.
So what now, captain?
We need to come up with a plan.
Later!
Raph RUNS OFF toward the action.
RAPH!!!
But Raph doesn't stop. All three look at each other. Then
Welcome home.

48 The boys cross over on a large CONSTRUCTION CRANE and sca up the few more stories to the top. They stand on a scaff underneath the floor of the activity. ON WALL - Deep CLAW MARKS are carved into the steel, much like by April and Casey's loft. Don notices.
Guys, I've got a bad feeling...
Ahh, let's take a tiny peek.
They scale to the top floor. Peering over the edge.
Well, there's a good/bad news scenario for ya.
CAM BEGINS TO CRANE UP from Turtles to activity on the fl
Good news is that there are a buncha Foot Ninja gettin' the snot kicked out of `em.
CAM FINISHES ON FLOOR - Showing SIX FOOT NINJAS and KARAI squaring off against a LARGE BIGFOOT-LIKE MONSTER! It tos them around like stuffed animals.
Bad news is WHAT's kickin' the snot out of `em...
ON TURTLES - As they've all now crept up to the dark corn of the floor. A FOOT NINJA gets clobbered and sails past them, and off the building. (safely to a scaffold below)
An interesting conundrum. Do we hold dear the value of life and help the Foot regardless of our tumultuous past?
I vote for sitting back and enjoying the show. (to Leo) Whaddaya say, leader boy?
ON LEO - He's troubled. The burden of "leader" shouldered
Nah. We kick butt.

Raph jumps forward! Leo rolls his eyes, as all the Turtle jump into the fray. The Foot are surprised at first, and Bigfoot Monster is confused as well. ON LEO - He stops when he comes face to face with Karai.
Who are YOU?!
ON KARAI - She pauses a moment. They exchange expert kata attacks. Stalemate. She gestures to the Foot as they use opportunity for their escape. As they leap away, Karai lo back at the Turtles...

The Creature immediately CHASES the boys throughout the structure, as they use all their ninja skills to avoid it not to mention impalement on the bed of rebar below! aph tries to turn the tables and attacks the Creature! Th boys have no choice but to help him... putting them in de trouble. The I-Beam is getting dented and twisted with each impact The tussle begins to fall - whoomp, whoomp - down many flights of floors. Raph gets separated at one point, jumping off the side of building to catch up, and swings himself back onto the bo floor to await the others. SMASH! They fall into Raph's floor.
Nice of ya's ta join me.
But the Turtles eventually get cornered. And just as the Creature closes in-
YEEEAAAAARGGHHH!!!!!
The creature stops. Confused. So are the other three turt
What? I saw it on a nature show once.
The creature SCREAMS BACK! Boys freak out.
AAAAAAGGHHHHH!!!!!

NGLE ABOVE TURTLES - As a large teetering pallet filled w dried cement and blocks to come CRASHING DOWN ON THEM! Th Turtles are buried under the rubble. RUH? - The Creature is confused... until it's hit with a blinding light, and then an EXPLOSION - FWOOM! We hear he footsteps thumping through the light. Shapes start to for until we see... ...LIVING VERSIONS OF THE FOUR STONE GENERALS! Sporting H TECH GEAR - a mix of tech with ancient magic scrawlings. Their bodies "glow" with a red inner life, seeping throug their stone cracks and piercing eyes. The Generals are all ANIMAL-THEMED - Mute and powerful Ap themed costume ("MONO"), Eagle Leader ("AGUILA"), agile Jaguar ("GATO") and the deadly snake-like female ("SERPIENTE"). Large. Imposing. Completely bad-ass. The Creature ROARS and FIGHTS to no avail...

BURIED POV - Silent. The Turtles start to GROAN, regainin consciousness. Moonlight shoots in as they move the rock stand up, groggy. ON MOUTH OF ALLEY - Through the smoke we can see silhouet a large hairy shape, along with FOUR VERY LARGE SHAPES. T sounds of freighter doors CLOSING, engines revving and th caravan of sorts pulling away. WHOOOOOP! - A POLICE SIREN chirps. Approaching the now- destroyed site.
Better hit the tunnels, guys.
Donnie uses a small prod to prop open a MANHOLE COVER. Do Mike and Leo jump in. Leo looks back, Raph is still stewi
Raph. Save it for another day.
RAPH!
Raph knows he has to go. Reluctantly he enters the sewer. lid closes as the alley is illuminated by POLICE CHERRIES
beat, then Mikey barely pops the lid open for another pee
Y'know, it's not that bad, dudes.
ON BUILDING - Actually, the place is destroyed. Dented, t and looking like a post-night raid in WWII.
49 UP ANGLE on the Tower. Dead of night. No one around.
50 A cavernous structure. Dimly lit. High ceiling. A few odd silhouettes here and there. We hear the clicking of Winters' shoes echo as he enters.
What seems to be the problem?
Karai and six Ninja are already there.
The "problem" is that we were hired to merely patrol the city and report anything "strange" to you.
KARAI(cont'd) (grabs sword hilt) You never said anything about MONSTERS.
Winters smirks, looking at the mouse who thinks he can ta the lion. He reaches to a satchel on the floor. The Foot TENSE in anticipation. Instead... Winters comes up with a MONEY BRICK.
(tosses money brick) So, your job duties were just redefined. Congratulations on your promotion.
SHINK! - Karai pulls out her To and slices the brick in m air. Winters STOPS and looks back over his shoulder.
We may be hired help to you, but you should never forget... we are the Foot Clan.
ON WINTERS - Condescendingly finds this particularly `cut
Oooooooh...

It sets the Foot off. They all grab their weapons, moving toward Winters. Karai flips forward, sword drawn and at Winters throat! ...as Winters stands still... and begins to LAUGH. Slowly, the thumping of FOUR SETS OF FEET lumber out of t shadows. Reveal themselves to be THE FOUR STONE GENERALS. They flank Winters, who is just loving the theatricality it all. The Foot Ninja leap back. Winters remains confident and unmoving. Generals SMIRK at Karai and the Foot.
I believe we made a deal, Karai. I expect you to honor it. (beat, stares her down) You do understand "honor", don't you?
Karai stews... unblinking stare. Of course she does.
So I don't care what part of "muscle for hire" you don't understand. I hired your muscle. Now exercise the ones attached to your feet and... (closer - terse) ...get back to work.
Karai slowly steps back. Winters smiles wide, reaches int the drawer and takes another brick of bills and tosses it
a Foot Ninja. Then another to a second Ninja.
So I will double... no, no... TRIPLE your pay for your troubles. (stare down) Are we cool?
ON FOOT - They just stare back, blank goggles. Probably seething inside. Winters is flanked by Generals.
Are we... cool?
The Foot don't move. Tense. Karai finally nods. Terse.
Ninjas. No sense of humor. (to Generals) So how did we fare?

CORRIDOR ENTRANCE - a hunched SHAPE undulating in chains wheeled into the light. Winters approaches it - chained to a high-tech and uplit pallet on the floor. We can barely make it out as being t HAIRY CREATURE from the I-beam fight.
(close, quiet) So it begins...

It SCREAMS. Fights it's restraints. Tires. Breathing heav Winters approaches, safely inches away from his fanged ma Creature suddenly lunges forward! Winters doesn't flinch. merely grins at the creature.
(to General Aguila) Were there any problems?
AGUILA speaks in a gravelly, hardened voice. He towers ov Winters by a foot. Clearly the leader of the four.
None, my lord.
(to Karai) You see, now THAT'S a good soldier. You two should compare notes.
Karai and Aguila stare at each other. Karai obviously not used to being handled like this.
Just what is this all about?

Oh, let's call it a scavenger hunt. (re: Generals) I now have the power and know-how, but I need the speed and stealth of an organization such as your own. Not to mention an organization that values discretion.
But of course.
You see, I have nine more beasts like this that should be coming to town very soon. Thirteen in all, to be exact.
The Four Generals move the monster into a position on the floor ahead - into a DISK on the floor. ON CEILING - We s the top of a CAGE inserted over top, creating a cell.
But... why? Why here? Why now?
Instinct, mostly. They're animals at their core. (looks off, distant) And they recognize something familiar in the air... in the stars. (BEAT) What can I say? I'm a lover of animals.
The disk ROTATES. WIDER we see that there are already som cells inserted on the large stone disk in the floor. Fill by darkened silhouettes of creatures that we're probably
we don't fully see. Glowing eyes pierce out of the darkne
So you go and get to know each other. And don't forget... play nice.
The Generals turn and walk-push the Foot out of the door. They move to fight back, but Karai waves her hand.
Not now. Our business will be handled at a later time...
After they leave, we pause for A BEAT on Winters. Quiet. Tired. Contemplative.
Three brothers sit around their breakfast table, looking over from the previous night's brawl. Mikey comes in, loo the worst of all, and plops into his seat. Cam circles ta
Dudes, did anyone get the license plate of the thing that hit us last night? Oi, my head...
Don pours over a thick book on MONSTERS AND MYTHOLOGY.
Was it just me, or did that creature look familiar?
We coulda taken it if you slackers woulda pitched in sooner.
Fact remains, Raph, that we should have never been there in the first place.
Well, I suppose that we shoulda let Mr. Cuddly-kins continue to spread happiness throughout the city... oh wait... HE WAS A FREAKING MONSTER TRYIN' TA KILL US!!! Good call, fearless leader.
Come to think of it, it WAS pretty strange to see the Foot too. And who was that woman?
I dunno, but she sure gave Leo a run for his money.
(still fighting with Raph) This is my fault now, Raph? I'm the only one who has to be responsible!
Hey, you're the "trained master", not me.
(quickly interjected) Dudes-can-it-here-comes-Splinter.
ON DOOR - Splinter walks in, HUMMING to himself.
Good morning, my sons.
Morning, sensei.
Splinter makes himself a TEA. Room is SILENT. ON TURTLES - Raph and Leo GLARE at one another while they eat. Don is pouring over a THICK BOOK while Mikey sits wi his forehead on the table.
If anyone needs me, I'll be watching my stories.
plinter walks out. OS sound of the TV being turned on. At the table, the glare continues.
